recipe.description: Butter chicken is a popular Indian dish that features tender chunks of chicken cooked in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce. This recipe usually starts with marinating chicken in a mixture of yogurt and spices like cumin, coriander, and garam masala, which helps to infuse the meat with flavor and keep it tender during cooking.
recipe.Ingredients: 1. One whole chicken 2. Butter 3. Cooking Oil
